description.en:
Where all my shaping stuff has been moved because it's both convenient for me to manage and i've been pestered to do it by people who want the decorative stuff only, along with a whole bunch of new stuff.

Contains also a remake and update of cataclystic shapes and builadable islands for your convenience. As usual switching one mod for the other will not break your ships.

Originals by Cataclysm at steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=651352596 and steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=663623106 

Has proper corridor by David Dire built in for your convenience.
Was buffed slightly, and some messy files were cleaned up.
Original at steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=638689969 

Has Ammo Vault by David Dire merged in. Graphics redone and updated.
Original at https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=635568937

Has the steel structural supports from RBI by Radium Bullet built in, with additional sizes.
Original at steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1131544112 

Has Stone Decorations by Blake merged in.
Original at https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1498882163 

Has Structural Lightener by Blake merged in.
Original at https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1499107764 

Has Supply Room by Splorky merged in.
Original at https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=948805852 

Has Guarded Hatch by Blueation merged in. Wooden and reinforced hatches added.
Original at https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=784888255 

Has Medium Berth by Blueation merged in. Stats modified to be different relative to the small quarters.
Original at https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=784888384 

Has Living Area by Blueation merged in. Stats modified to be different relative to the large quarters.
Original at https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=784888328
